casebody.data:
The City of Charlotte, a municipal corporation
v.
University Financial Properties, LLC, a North Carolina Limited Liability Company f/k/a University Bank Properties Limited Partnership, a North Carolina limited partnership, et al. No. 183P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Nicolas E. Tosco, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jonathan E. Hall, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The City of Charlotte. Martin L. White, Attorney at Law, Susanne Todd, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for University Financial Properties, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of May 2016 by Defendant (University Financial Properties, LLC) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
